name: Parasomnia Walker
description:
Help a failing student keep his grades up by battling his nightmares head on! Parasomnia Walker has you playing as a dream therapist as he combats monsters inside his patient's dream. It is a turn based dungeon crawler with a V.A.T.S like system of combat.

This is a game made by me and my second-year buddies at QUT for our assessment. The focus of our assignment was to make a first-person game with three themes: Luck, Dream, and Wild. Hope you enjoy!
